instructions.1: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).
instructions.2: Place a cast iron skillet in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.
instructions.3: Whisk 3 eggs together in a bowl until well blended and frothy. Add milk and 2 tablespoons melted butter; mix well. Stir in flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper and blend until batter is smooth.
instructions.4: Place 1 tablespoon butter in the hot skillet and swirl until bottom is evenly coated and butter is melted. Pour batter into the skillet and place immediately in the oven.
instructions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until edges are brown and pancake is inflated, 15 to 20 minutes.
instructions.6: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat; crack 4 eggs into skillet. Cook until desired doneness is reached, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
instructions.7: Mix ricotta cheese, salt, and pepper, together in a bowl.
instructions.8: Cut pancake into 4 pieces and top each with a fried egg, ham, ricotta cheese, and Parmesan shavings.
